data.title: Anoka County, MN - Official Website
data.text:
Visit our online event calendar for in-person and virtual programs throughout the summer.

Tiny Art Contest - All ages blast off into creativity!

JUNE

Pick up a Tiny Art template available at any Anoka County Library branch (while supplies last). Paints are available upon request at the desk - limited supply.

Design your Tiny Art bookmark & return it to the same location.

Turn in artwork by June 30th.

JULY

Vote on your favorite pieces in two age groups

Youth Group for ages 14 and under

Teen & Adult Group for ages 15 and older

Tiny Art Show Ballots will be accepted through July 31st.

AUGUST

Winning designs from each branch will be printed as bookmarks in the fall.

Artists can pick up their artwork in September.

For every 15 minutes of reading that is logged in Beanstack, $1 of fines or fees will be removed.

Call a librarian to have your fines removed by August 19, 2024. Applies only to accounts listed in a minor childâ€™s name. Some restrictions apply.
